attributes.action: Stop paying MP's and other public servants final salary pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is an outrage that MP's and other public servants receive expensive final salary pensions at the public's expense while most of the electorate are lucky if they can afford a money purchase plan.

MP's and other public servants should get no more favourable treatment than the average working man - ie put them on contributory money purchase schemes and end this hypocrisy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
